changelog:
- kernel: 4.9.184 Upstream (beryllium, tissot, vince)
- kernel: 4.4.184 Upstream (lavender)
- kernel: 4.14.131 Upstream (violet)
- Allow disabling quick settings on secure lock screen
- Introduce statusbar brightness control
- Q seekbar: Add extra tweaks
- Fix multiuser icon glitch in QS footer
- Import Android Q activity animations
- SmartCharging: add reset battery stats option
- Decrease padding for statusbar icons
- Launcher3: Random fixes
- Other fixes and system optimizations
